Title: Germany issues early warning for gas supplies amid threat of halt in Russian gas supplies
Description: Germany has issued an early warning for gas supplies for precautionary purposes to prepare the country with adequate supplies in the event that Russia halts gas flows.
Author: CK

Title: Japan’s LNG stocks slip below four-year average for March
Description: LNG stocks held by Japan’s power utilities slipped for a second consecutive week, dragging the average stock levels for March well below the average for the month over the last four years.
Author: CK

Title: Bangladesh’s RPGCL, India’s Gail seek second-half April LNG cargoes
Description: Bangladesh’ state-owned Rupantarita Prakritik Gas Co. (RPGCL)and India’s state-owned Gail have issued tenders to buy one cargo each for delivery in late April.
Author: CK

Title: Sakhalin Energy issues tender to sell early May LNG cargo
Description: Sakhalin Energy is offering one cargo that will load on May 7 at its 10.9 mtpa Sakhalin LNG terminal at Russia’s Prigorodnoye port through a tender that will close on Apr. 1.
Author: CK

Title: Planned Stade LNG import terminal in Germany gets municipal backing
Description: The planned LNG import terminal in the Hanseatic city of Stade in Germany’s Lower Saxony region has received approval from municipal authorities, paving the way for another LNG import terminal to come online in Germany.
Author: CK

Title: China’s ENN agrees 20-year term deals with Energy Transfer for Lake Charles LNG
Description: Chinese independent firm ENN Natural Gas (ENN NG) and its subsidiary ENN Energy have agreed to buy a combined 2.7 mtpa of LNG over a 20-year term from US pipeline midstream operator Energy Transfer’s planned Lake Charles LNG project in Louisiana in the US.
Author: CK
